    "title": "Java Basics Quiz",
    "description": "Test your Java knowledge",

    ],

}

{
    "createExerciseRequest": {
        "title": "(Javascript) Bài tập tính tổng",
        "description": "Cho 2 số, tính tổng",
        "difficulty": "EASY",
        "exerciseType": "CODING",
        "orgId": null,
        "cost": 0,
        "freeForOrg": true,
        "startTime": "2025-08-01T00:00:00Z",
        "endTime": "2025-12-31T23:59:59Z",
        "duration": 30,
        "allowDiscussionId": null,
        "resourceIds": [],
        "tags": [
            "math",
            "easy"
        ],
        "allowAiQuestion": false,
        "visibility": true
    },
    "addCodingDetailRequest": {
        "topic": "math",
        "allowedLanguages": [
            "python",
            "java",
            "cpp"
        ],
        "input": "a b",
        "output": "a+b",
        "constraintText": "a,b ≤ 10^9",
        "timeLimit": 1,
        "memoryLimit": 128,
        "maxSubmissions": 5,
        "codeTemplate": "def solve():\n    pass",
        "solution": "def solve():\n    a,b=map(int,input().split());print(a+b)",
        "testCases": [
            {
                "input": "1 2",
                "expectedOutput": "3",
                "sample": true,
                "note": "mẫu 1"
            },
            {
                "input": "10 20",
                "expectedOutput": "30",
                "sample": false,
                "note": ""
            }
        ]
    }
}
